column1:
RT @electroboyusa: Why do Republicans think we're EMERGING from the #COVID19 epidemic when these are the facts?

116,831 dead 
2,117,027 ca…

He used “economic” or a version thereof ~8 times in 54 second clip. Add in some “atta-boys” & you can see his priority is not making testing widely available to prevent further spread of #coronavirus #WhereAreTheTests #TrumpVirusCoverup #trumpvirus #TrumpCrash
